Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a (non eschatological) ruler appointed by God and anointed with oil by a prophet or priest
= man; ► king of Persia (פָּרַס) who allowed the exiles from Judah (יְהוּדָה) to return
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to seize|to hold|to take hold|to grasp|to handle
Node.definition: = action by which humans take hold of other humans or objects with their hands; the agent role is often extended figuratively to include objects, deities and certain conditions
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun
literally: to tread underfoot; hence: = causative action by which humans or, by extension, deities use force to bring (other) humans and areas under their authority and control

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural

= the two sides of the body of humans and certain animals between the rib cage and the hips, ► which is the place where people normally tie a girdle, breeches, loincloth, or sackcloth; ≈ a symbol of strength
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

literally: to ungird (someone's) loins; hence: = causative action by which humans remove other humans from a position of authority, ◄ as if that authority was symbolized by the belt around their waist

= causative action by which humans or deities allow others entrance, passage, or access (in)to a building, construction, or area ◄ by withdrawing a gate, door, window, lid, covering, or other boundary; ≈ sometimes associated with freedom, sometimes with being exposed, vulnerable

= a hinged barrier at the entrance to a town, building, or room; ◄ usually made out of wood, but occasionally also out of metal; ► provides or prevents access; ≈ sometimes associated with vulnerability
= causative action by which humans close the entrance(s) to a location, supposedly by shutting its doors (דֶּלֶת)
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
read הָרְרִים (הַר) with Qumran and LXX

Node.gloss: to make straight|to make smooth|to make level|to make even
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause objects to be without curve or bend and/or have an even or regular surface

= a hinged barrier at the entrance to a town, building, or room; ◄ usually made out of wood, but occasionally also out of metal; ► provides or prevents access; ≈ sometimes associated with vulnerability
= a yellowish brown alloy of copper with up to one third tin, ≈ regarded as a hard and difficult to bend
a long rigid piece of wood, metal, or similar material, attached in horizontal position to a gate so that it cannot be opened from the outside
= a strong, hard magnetic silvery grey metal, ► used in construction and manufacturing; ≈ associated with strength and permanence
= causative action by which a human being breaks an object into two pieces in a violent way, so that it will no longer be functional
= valuable goods in one's possession; ≈ falsely considered a source of well being

= state in which there is no light, ◄ caused by the fact that the light of sun, moon, and stars cannot reach the location that is in focus, ► resulting in a state in which no one can readily see, and colors and shapes can no longer be distinguished; loved by the wicked only; ≈ associated with hardship, ignorance, death, and oblivion
= objects of value that are usually kept invisible from others to keep them safe
= a place where humans or animals go in order to not be readily seen by others, ► either to keep safe from danger or to attack others
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: to cry out; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities let (other) humans know that they are to come, either by approaching them directly or sending a message
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= individual or group of people especially selected and appointed for a certain purpose
literally: to cry out; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities let (other) humans know that they are to come, either by approaching them directly or sending a message
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= cauative action by which humans or deities assign a name or title to (other) humans, either to honor or flatter them
literally: to know (God); hence: = action by which humans, either as individuals or as groups, assume a position of subservience towards a deity
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= marker indicating that an object or event is not included in a range of objects or events

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= to tie a belt or girdle around someone else's waist; ≈ often used metaphorically to denote arming someone for battle, or, in a more abstract sense, to clothe people with certain characteristics and qualities, such as joy, strength, and courage
literally: to know (God); hence: = action by which humans, either as individuals or as groups, assume a position of subservience towards a deity
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
literally: the rising of the sun: = a cardinal direction indicating the direction of the rising sun
literally: sunset; hence: = a cardinal direction indicating the direction towards the setting of the sun
= state of non existence of a person, place or event
= particle indicating that a certain state is not true or that an event does not take place without the involvement of someone else
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= causative action by which humans or deities create an object, ◄ described as an artisan shaping clay into an artifact

= light as a physical phenomenon, mainly observed during daytime, and the opposite of darkness; ◄ one of God's most important attributes; first created by God and since produced by sun, moon, and stars, but also by fire; ► enables people and animals to see; ≈ associated with life, goodness, happiness, prosperity, security, favor, and wisdom, loved by the righteous, and hated by the wicked
= causative action by which a deity brings to existence something that did not exist before

= state in which there is no light, ◄ caused by the fact that the light of sun, moon, and stars cannot reach the location that is in focus, ► resulting in a state in which no one can readily see, and colors and shapes can no longer be distinguished; loved by the wicked only; ≈ associated with hardship, ignorance, death, and oblivion

Node.gloss: to cause to happen|to bring about
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause events to take place without them having to necessarily be involved in the event itself

Node.gloss: to create (an event)|to cause to happen
Node.definition: = causative action by which a deity causes something to happen that did not happen before
= state of an event or an object that is very difficult or painful or harmful; also used to describe the attitude or emotion in reaction to such an event
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
a more or less fixed phrase: the heavens and the earth, equivalent to a single lexical item: the totality of God's creation

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= process by which objects open up ► in order to give access to something located inside or to create a passage

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= process by which a branch grows out of the stump or the root of a tree, or by which a plant grows directly out of the soil
= a state in which a human or deity helps a human in need to be safe / a safe state

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness

Node.gloss: to cause to sprout|to make come up|to cause to bring forth
Node.definition: = causative process by which a deity or the earth causes plants or horns to come up and start growing; ≈ sometimes extended to denote the coming in existence of people, conditions, or activities
= state in which multiple events are connected
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to create (an event)|to cause to happen
Node.definition: = causative action by which a deity causes something to happen that did not happen before
= exclamation expressing emotion concerning suffering that will come over an individual or nation
= action by which humans initiate a possible argument or conflict with other humans or with a deity by accusing them of wrongdoing or by taking action in a different way
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= causative action by which humans or deities create an object, ◄ described as an artisan shaping clay into an artifact
= container ◄ made of baked clay; ► used for household activities, in sacrificial rituals, and for the storage of documents; ≈ regarded as of low value
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= container ◄ made of baked clay; ► used for household activities, in sacrificial rituals, and for the storage of documents; ≈ regarded as of low value

= the surface of the earth, containing the substance that God used to create animals and humans, and to which they return when they die; on this surface plants and trees grow, humans labor to grow crops and worship God, who sustains all life, but who can also strike it with a curse so that nothing grows again
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= stiff tenacious earth; ► material of which bricks, pottery, and even man himself is made; ≈ buildings made with this material are regarded as relatively weak as opposed to buildings made of stone; therefore it is also seen as relatively worthless material
= causative action by which humans or deities create an object, ◄ described as an artisan shaping clay into an artifact

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
literally: hand; hence: = part of an object extending out in a certain direction, ◄ similar to function of the body's hand or arm
= exclamation expressing emotion concerning suffering that will come over an individual or nation

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= process by which males among humans and animals generate offspring
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= process by which humans and animals bring forth new offspring

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= causative action by which humans or deities create an object, ◄ described as an artisan shaping clay into an artifact
literally: to come; hence: = process by which things happen to someone ◄ as if it were a person coming to visit
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= causative action by which a deity brings to existence something that did not exist before
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
literally: to stretch out; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities causes an area to be covered with something with the shape and the flexibility of a large piece of cloth

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

Node.gloss: host of heaven|sun, moon, and stars
Node.definition: = collective of all celestial bodies that give light; ◄ created by God; ► often worshiped by people, contrary to God's law; ≈ in Daniel 8 possibly used as a metaphor for the people of God
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= causative action by which someone causes someone else's inactivity to end so that he comes into action, ◄ as if he had been sleeping for a certain time

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
literally: to make someone else's way straight; = causative action by which deities cause the actions and endeavors of humans to be prosperous and successful
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= a group of people who have been forcibly taken from their land to another

Node.gloss: to let go|to dismiss|to send (someone) on his way|to free|to release
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities allow (other) humans to leave a certain place and go home
= the amount of money expected, required, or given in payment for something
= an object, usually of some value, given to a person; ► can be given without any expectation of exchange or often with the purpose to influence or persuade another person

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= the results of laborious work which requires a lot of energy and ultimately results in exhaustion
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= ethnic group and their territory, ◄ regarded as descendants of Cush, son of Ham (חָם)
= member of the ethnic group ◄ founded by Seba (סְבָא) ≈ known as people tall of stature
literally: a person of measure; hence: = an unusually tall or large person
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= chains or shackles attached to the feet of a captive ► in order to restrain their movements
= action by which humans lay themselves down on the ground in front of another human or a deity, ► as an act of submission or respect
= particle marking a constituent as representing a limited number of entities
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= state of non existence of a person, place or event
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= marker used to affirm the truth of the following statement, which is in contrast with what was assumed to be the truth earlier on
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= action by which humans go to a location where they will not be readily seen or where danger cannot reach them
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts

Node.gloss: to be ashamed|to come to shame|to be put to shame|to be disappointed
Node.definition: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= causative action by which humans cause other humans to experience a feeling of shame
= state in which humans or objects are jointly involved in an event
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life
= state in which humans experience a feeling of shame, as a result of their own actions or because of what other have done
= person with the skill to produce an artifact out of rough materials, such as stone, wood, metal
= a physical likeness or representation of a person, animal, or thing in the form of an image or a drawing; ► functioning in non sanctioned rituals or as an object of non sanctioned worship

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue of humans in need
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

Node.gloss: to be ashamed|to come to shame|to be put to shame|to be disappointed
Node.definition: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status
= causative action by which humans cause other humans to experience a feeling of shame
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= an adverb that specifies unending time

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which a deity brings to existence something that did not exist before
a more or less fixed phrase: the heavens and the earth, equivalent to a single lexical item: the totality of God's creation
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= causative action by which humans or deities create an object, ◄ described as an artisan shaping clay into an artifact

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= causative action by which humans or deities cause an object to be firmly located in a certain place
= location that is devoid of any life and without any structure or order
= causative action by which a deity brings to existence something that did not exist before
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= causative action by which humans or deities create an object, ◄ described as an artisan shaping clay into an artifact
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= state in which knowledge, an object, or an action is kept hidden or unknown from others

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= state in which there is no light, ◄ caused by the fact that the light of sun, moon, and stars cannot reach the location that is in focus, ► resulting in a state in which no one can readily see, and colors and shapes can no longer be distinguished; loved by the wicked only; ≈ associated with hardship, ignorance, death, and oblivion

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= a person’s child or children, or the young of an animal

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
= location that is devoid of any life and without any structure or order
= action where humans make an intensive effort to associate with a deity, to serve and worship him, and to get answers to questions
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
literally: smoothness; hence: = state in which an event is morally and ethically right

Node.gloss: to come together|to gather|to assemble|to rally|to (re)unite
Node.definition: = action by which humans or animals come together as a group for a common purpose

Node.gloss: to approach|to come near|to draw near|to come forward
Node.definition: = action by which humans move to a location closer to a point of reference
= state in which humans or objects are jointly involved in an event

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
literally: to know; hence: = state in which humans are endowed with knowledge, often through experience

Node.gloss: to take up|to lift up|to carry
Node.definition: literally: to lift up; hence: = action by which humans take hold of objects with their hands, with the intention of holding them or bringing them to another location

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a single piece of wood taken from a tree, cut and finished, and used for building and construction
= a physical likeness or representation of a person, animal, or thing; ◄ carved out of wood and sometimes stone, ► and functioning as an object of non sanctioned worship
= generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts

Node.gloss: to bring close|to bring near|to present|to offer
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans cause (other) humans, animals and objects to move to a location closer to a point of reference

marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied), and also often used to affirm this new information as more conclusive or compelling than the information preceding it
= action by which humans come together to exercise their minds as a group to determine how they are going to achieve a particular purpose
= state in which humans or objects are jointly involved in an event

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= referent pointing to a period or point of time in the distant past
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= particle indicating that a certain state is not true or that an event does not take place without the involvement of someone else
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= marker indicating that an object or event is not included in a range of objects or events
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts

Node.gloss: ends of the earth > all people on earth
Node.definition: literally: ends of the earth; hence: = all people on earth, including those living in its remotest corners

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= action by which humans or deities make a solemn statement often calling on a higher power to confirm that what is said is true or to punish the speaker if it turns out not to be true
literally: (word) come out of (someone); hence: = process by which words are spoken by humans or deities
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
literally: to return (without having reached its goal); = process by which an event fails to reach its intended goal
literally: to go down on (one's) knees; hence: = action by which humans kneel down in order to show respect
= central area of the leg where the thigh is joined to the lower leg; ≈ associated with stability and strength
= action by which humans or deities use an oath to solemnly declare that they will be true to other humans or deities
= the fleshy organ in the mouth, used for tasting, licking, swallowing, and (in the case of humans) speaking
= particle marking a constituent as representing a limited number of entities
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= action of humans or deities that is in accordance with the requirements of the divine law and and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this type of behavior as a standard, which often requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= state in which a person, supernatural being, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y

Node.gloss: to be ashamed|to come to shame|to be put to shame|to be disappointed
Node.definition: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status
= process by which humans or deities experience extreme displeasure, ◄ described as an internal fire
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to prove to be righteous|to be just|to be in the right|to be innocent
Node.definition: = state or process by which humans and deities are found to conform to an accepted code of behavior

= action by which humans express their pride and satisfaction about themselves, their actions, certain circumstances they find themselves in, or a deity that they consider responsible for those circumstances
= a person’s child or children, or the young of an animal

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
